currentdescription: Design & Drawing,Fabrication,Supply ,Erection,  Testing & Commissioning of  fixed wheel type vertical lift Spillway Gate Tentive Size :- 18.80 M X 5.50 M-  05 Nos  ,Under  Sluice Gate Tentive  Size: 18.80 M X 6.50 M- 01 Nos  , Stoplog Gate Tentive Size:-  18.70 M X1.40 M - 06 Nos With  Embedded Part,  Structural Steel  Hoist Bridge & Platform , Structural Steel Trestle Consisting of  Column (Box types ) , Approch   Ladder both side  and Control Room &  Motorised Hoisting System  and Automation (SCADA) system  at Belwa Site including the Cost of All Materials, Machinery,Labour  All complete Job as per Approved drawing Specification of  Head Regulator on Belwa Under Bagmati Flood Management Scheme IV (A) Under Bagmati Division Sheohar  Dist.- Sheohar
